title: 820-2915 not booting
message:
Hi Fellows, I have a 820-2915 that powers on green and red light, fans happily spinning but no chime. No obvious liquid damage spotted. So far I have checked if 3.42 makes it to the SMC it seems ok (measured 3.49 though). What more should i check?

EDIT: No light on USB mouse

title: 820-2915 not booting
message: CPU V-Core present? Check that and work backwards.

title: 820-2915 not booting
message:
Just for a learning moment; why would you check 3V42 when the board turns on already?

Probably a dead GPU, heat it up and see if it works again, then either battle with Apple to get it fixed under GPU program or replace the GPU.

title: 820-2915 not booting
message: Thanks for the tips, just been doing this for less then a year so many learning moments needed ;). Will try to reflow the GPU see if I can get it working like that. And check CPU V-Core as well. Since it is an 15 inch might very well be the GPU.
